verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7799>Shoshannim<s%>, A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God<s%>; for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> in unto my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

I <S%H2883>sink<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire<s%>, where there is no <S%H4613>standing<s%>: I am <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, where the <S%H7641>floods<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me.
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> of my <S%H7121>crying<s%>: my <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>dried<s%>: mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> while I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for my <S%H430>God<s%>.

They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head<s%>: they that would <S%H6789>destroy<s%> me, being mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%>, are <S%H6105>mighty<s%>: then I <S%H7725>restored<s%> that which I took not <S%H1497>away<s%>.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H200>foolishness<s%>; and my <S%H819>sins<s%> are not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from thee.

Let not them that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for my sake: let not those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for my sake, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Because for thy sake I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; <S%H3639>shame<s%> hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>.
I am become a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> unto my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and an <S%H5237>alien<s%> unto my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>.
For the <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of thine <S%H1004>house<s%> hath eaten me <S%H398>up<s%>; and the <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> of them that <S%H2778>reproached<s%> thee are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon me.
When I <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and chastened my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, that was to my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> also my <S%H3830>garment<s%>; and I became a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to them.
They that sit <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> against me; and I was the <S%H5058>song<s%> of the <S%H8354%H7941>drunkards<s%>.

But as for me, my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>: O <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, in the <S%H571>truth<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H2916>mire<s%>, and let me not <S%H2883>sink<s%>: let me be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and out of the <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

Let not the <S%H4325%H7641>waterflood<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me, neither let the <S%H4688>deep<s%> swallow me <S%H1104>up<s%>, and let not the <S%H875>pit<s%> <S%H332>shut<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> upon me.

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto me according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>.
And <S%H5641>hide<s%> not thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>; for I am in <S%H6887>trouble<s%>: <S%H6030>hear<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily<s%>.
Draw <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it: <S%H6299>deliver<s%> me because of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, and my <S%H1322>shame<s%>, and my <S%H3639>dishonour<s%>: mine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> are all before thee.

<S%H2781>Reproach<s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and I am full of <S%H5136>heaviness<s%>: and I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for some to take <S%H5110>pity<s%>, but there was none; and for <S%H5162>comforters<s%>, but I <S%H4672>found<s%> none.
They <S%H5414>gave<s%> me also <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>meat<s%>; and in my <S%H6772>thirst<s%> they gave me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>.
Let their <S%H7979>table<s%> become a <S%H6341>snare<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and that which should have been for their <S%H7965>welfare<s%>, let it become a <S%H4170>trap<s%>.
Let their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened<s%>, that they <S%H7200>see<s%> not; and make their <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H4571>shake<s%>.
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon them, and let thy <S%H2740>wrathful<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> take <S%H5381>hold<s%> of them.
Let their <S%H2918>habitation<s%> be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; and let none <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
For they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him whom thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%>; and they <S%H5608>talk<s%> to the <S%H4341>grief<s%> of those whom thou hast <S%H2491>wounded<s%>.
<S%H5414>Add<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> unto their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: and let them not <S%H935>come<s%> into thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
Let them be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>, and not be <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H3510>sorrowful<s%>: let thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, set me up on <S%H7682>high<s%>.
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H7892>song<s%>, and will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>.
This also shall <S%H3190>please<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> than an <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H6499>bullock<s%> that hath <S%H7160>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hoofs<s%>.
The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this, and be <S%H8055>glad<s%>: and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%>, and <S%H959>despiseth<s%> not his <S%H615>prisoners<s%>.
Let the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> him, the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and every thing that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> therein.

For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there, and have it in <S%H3423>possession<s%>.
The <S%H2233>seed<s%> also of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it: and they that <S%H157>love<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein.
